verbs.description: [ARG0: The Russian leader] [V: said] [ARG1: he would stand up to any attempts by U.S. President Donald Trump to block a Russian - German gas pipeline] .
The Russian leader said he [V: would] stand up to any attempts by U.S. President Donald Trump to block a Russian - German gas pipeline .
The Russian leader said [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: stand] up [C-ARG1: to any attempts by U.S. President Donald Trump to block a Russian - German gas pipeline] .
The Russian leader said he would stand up to any attempts by U.S. President Donald Trump to [V: block] [ARG1: a Russian - German gas pipeline] .
